model.description: As of around 1/2/24, I changed the source of the PLS price from CoinMarketCap to Descreener. At that time the taxable income for the fy ending 30/6/24 was around $19K. Since CMC's PLS price was on average 10% higher up until 1/2/24, I will reduce the taxable income amount by $1.9K for the fy year ending 30/6/24, to take into account the overpriced PLS at the time it was received from 1/7/23 to 30/6/24.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM("taxableIncomeFX") * 1e-18 FROM pls_wallet_history
where date >= '2022-07-01' and date <= '2023-06-30'

SELECT SUM("taxableIncomeFX") * 1e-18 FROM pls_wallet_history
where date >= '2023-07-01' and date <= '2024-06-30'

SELECT SUM("taxableIncomeFX") * 1e-18 FROM pls_wallet_history
where date >= '2024-07-01' and date <= '2025-06-30'

model.title: Taxable Income (AUD)

panels.description:
In order for these values to change, my PLS rewards need to be sold. I record a sale of a specific tranche of PLS by opening the pls_wallet_history table in pgAdmin and adding a date (date_sold field) and price (pricefx_sold) values to the record that holds the amount of PLS that I am selling. Doing this will then enable the query in this panel to calculate the capital gain/loss.
If this panel is blank, it means that no PLS have been sold from the PLS rewards received from validating.

targets.rawSql:
select sum(case 
		   when ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") < 0 
		   then ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX"
		   when extract(day from "date_sold" - "date") > 365 
		   then ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX" * 0.5
		   else ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX"
		   end) * 1e-18
		   as cap_gain_loss from pls_wallet_history
       where date_sold >= '2022-07-01' and date_sold <= '2023-06-30'

select sum(case 
		   when ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") < 0 
		   then ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX"
		   when extract(day from "date_sold" - "date") > 365 
		   then ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX" * 0.5
		   else ("pricefx_sold" - "priceFX") * "taxableIncomeFX" / "priceFX"
		   end) * 1e-18
		   from pls_wallet_history
       where date_sold >= '2023-07-01' and date_sold <= '2024-06-30'

panels.title: Capital Gain / Loss (AUD)

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last hour and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
-- all parts changed (commented) occurred on 6/4/24
--SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
SUM("balanceChange")  * 1e-18 as PLS  FROM pls_wallet_history
WHERE
address = '$pls_wallet'
--AND index <> 36521405
and "balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator
AND
-- "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '1 hour' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals);
"date" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("date") - INTERVAL '1 hour' FROM pls_wallet_history) AND (SELECT MAX("date") FROM pls_wallet_history);

panels.title: Last Hour

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last day and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
-- all parts changed (commented) occurred on 6/4/24
--SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
SUM("balanceChange")  * 1e-18 as PLS  FROM pls_wallet_history
WHERE
address = '$pls_wallet'
--AND index <> 36521405
and "balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator
AND
-- "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '1 hour' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals);
"date" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("date") - INTERVAL '1 day' FROM pls_wallet_history) AND (SELECT MAX("date") FROM pls_wallet_history);

panels.title: Last day

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last week and calculates USD

panels.title: Last week

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last 30 days(month) and calculates USD

SELECT
-- all parts changed (commented) occurred on 6/4/24
--SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
SUM("balanceChange")  * 1e-18 as PLS  FROM pls_wallet_history
WHERE

--AND index <> 36521405
and "balanceChange" >= 0

AND

panels.title: Last Month

panels.description: Get's last block chain from node and shows it's against the last checked block on the scheduler - This is used to know how much our data is up to date.

targets.rawSql: SELECT blockheight FROM pls_block_explorer ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Current/Checked Height

panels.description:
It shows all time data:
Sum of all PLS rewards(total) since starting
It's value in current USD price
Current USD price for reference
And APR calculated from the last week. (If there's no a week of data, it will not show this)

targets.rawSql:
-- original query below as of 6/4/24
-- SELECT SUM(amount)  * $pls_precision as PLS  FROM pls_validator_withdrawals where address = '$pls_wallet'
-- AND index <> 36521405 -- this is the index number of the 32M PLS validator deposit returned when I exited one validator
-- modified query below as of 6/4/24 to make it more accurate as it captures priority fee / tip rewards as well
SELECT SUM("balanceChange")  * 1e-18 as PLS  FROM pls_wallet_history where address = '$pls_wallet'
and "balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator

-- original query as of 6/4/24
-- SELECT SUM(amount) * $pls_price * $pls_precision as USD FROM pls_validator_withdrawals where address = '$pls_wallet'
-- AND index <> 36521405
-- modified query as of 6/4/24
SELECT SUM("balanceChange") * 1e-18 * $pls_price as USD FROM pls_wallet_history where address = '$pls_wallet'
and "balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator
SELECT "priceUSD" FROM pls_price ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ((SUM("balanceChange") * 1e-18) * 52.142 / (cast(1 as bigint) * ($validator_count - 1) * $validator_deposit) * $enough_data) as "APR"
FROM pls_wallet_history 
WHERE 
address = '$pls_wallet'
AND "balanceChange" >= 0
-- id <> 1273 and id <> 2146 and id <> 2168 and id <> 2803 and id <> 3679 and id <> 4377 and id <> 5289 and id <> 6655 and id <> 6719
-- and id <> 7148
and
"date" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("date") - INTERVAL '7 days' FROM pls_wallet_history) AND (SELECT MAX("date") FROM pls_wallet_history);

panels.title: All Time

panels.description: Address balance in PLS doesn't include ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 tokens).

targets.rawSql: SELECT balance * 1E-18 as PLS FROM pls_wallets where address = '$pls_wallet'
SELECT balance * 1E-18 * $pls_price as USD FROM pls_wallets where address = '$pls_wallet'

panels.title: Wallet Balance

panels.description: Address balance in PLS doesn't include ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 tokens).

targets.rawSql: SELECT date at time zone '$my_timezone' as timeStamp, balance * 1E-18 as value FROM pls_wallet_history where address = '$pls_wallet' order by timeStamp asc

panels.title: Wallet Balance History

panels.description:
This shows a bar graph to see the performance of withdrawals for the last 24hours per hour.

Since withdrawals could be made at any time, some times(hours) could be skipped.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
-- 6/4/24: commented code changed and replaced with code uncommented
-- $__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone', '1h'),
$__timeGroupAlias("date" at time zone '$my_timezone', '1h'), 
-- sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS
sum("balanceChange" * 1e-18) as PLS
FROM pls_wallet_history
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
"balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator
and
--index <> 36521405
-- $__timeFilter("timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone')
$__timeFilter("date" at time zone '$my_timezone') 
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT
-- 6/4/24: commented code changed and replaced with code uncommented
-- $__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone', '1h'),
$__timeGroupAlias("date" at time zone '$my_timezone', '1h'), 
-- sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS
sum("balanceChange" * 1e-18 * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_wallet_history
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
"balanceChange" >= 0
and cast("balanceChange" * 1e-18 as decimal) % 32e+6 <> 0 -- needed to exclude any amount resulting from exiting a validator
and
--index <> 36521405
-- $__timeFilter("timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone')
$__timeFilter("date" at time zone '$my_timezone') 
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Validator Rewards

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
"validatorIndex", 
sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS, 
sum(amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
and index <> 36521405
group by 1
order by 1 asc

SELECT 
"timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone' as timeStamp, 
"index",
"blockNumber", 
"validatorIndex",
amount * $pls_precision as PLS, 
amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price as USD,
"priceUSD" as "$ at W"

FROM pls_validator_withdrawals WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
and index <> 36521405
order by 2 desc

list.definition: select owner as __text , address as __value from pls_wallets
list.label: Wallet Owner
list.name: pls_wallet
list.query: select owner as __text , address as __value from pls_wallets

list.definition: select "priceUSD" from pls_price order by "date" desc limit(1)
list.label: pls_price
list.name: pls_price
list.query: select "priceUSD" from pls_price order by "date" desc limit(1)

list.definition:
select
extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
list.name: days_of_data
list.query:
select
extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'

list.definition:
select
((extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer)>7) ::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
list.name: enough_data
list.query:
select
((extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer)>7) ::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
